author: alito
text:
564 U. S. ____ (2011)564 U. S. ____ (2011)564 U. S. ____ (2011)SUPREME COURT OF THE UNITED STATESNO. 10-174AMERICAN ELECTRIC POWER COMPANY, INC., et al.,
PETITIONERSv.CONNECTICUT et al.on writ of certiorari to the united states court of
appeals for the second circuit[June 20, 2011]Justice Alito, with whom Justice
Thomas joins, concurring in part and concurring in the
judgment.I concur in the judgment, and I
agree with the Court’s displacement analysis on the assumption
(which I make for the sake of argument because no party contends
otherwise) that the interpretation of the Clean Air Act, 42 U.
S. C. §7401et seq., adopted by the majority inMassachusettsv.EPA,549 U. S. 497(2007), is
correct.
